# emacs

## Tips

[Using emacsclient on MacOS](https://blog.lambda.cx/posts/using-emacsclient-on-macos/)

### OS X

Fix `kitty` terminal:

`ln -s /Applications/kitty.app/Contents/Resources/kitty/terminfo ~/.terminfo`

Install `emacs-plus`:

`https://github.com/d12frosted/homebrew-emacs-plus`

Start in terminal:

`emacsclient -t -a ''`
